column5: This is no time to get sidetracked...

At least, I don't think I saw
anyone go to the Tower Ruins.
I wanted to ask that beautiful girl
If I ever find that man in
If I ever find him again, I'll
Looks like most of the buildings

Why would that man in black
come all the way here to
Lyra... If you hang around here
like this, you'll catch a cold.
She said she had fun here.

But if you start talking like that, it

Cygna and Creha back to us!
I'll be waiting on this island.
For all of you to return.
I should be able to use it to

Though Eartha was surprised at first, she gladly

It might have wandered onto the ferry
and ended up on this island.
(If only I had a decent doghouse...
Maybe I should check the general store?)
